name: Pumpkin!
description:
Crazy Pumpkin is going home!

We hope you’re having fun playing Crazy Pumpkin :)
Just tap the screen to guide the pumpkin, try to go as far as possible from the starting point. Don’t hit the stones, get coins for more points and get colorful mushrooms for extra powers.

Very easy to play but equally hard to reach a high score!

Features:
- Free to play
- Play it anywhere, anytime
- Endless gameplay
- Simple one finger control, just tap the screen :)
- Challenge your friends with your best high score
- Suitable for all ages

Would you like some extra features for the game? Don't be shy, write a review. We would love to hear your feedback!

Let’s play!
